hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and Port of the SAP Datasphere tenant instance (e.g., https://tenant.eu10.hcs.cloud.sap).

clientId.title: OAuth Client ID
clientId.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID for authenticating with SAP Datasphere. Create this in System > Administration > App Integration.

clientSecret.title: OAuth Client Secret
clientSecret.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret for authenticating with SAP Datasphere.

tokenEndpoint.title: Token Endpoint
tokenEndpoint.description: OAuth 2.0 Token Endpoint URL for obtaining access tokens. Usually in the format: https://tenant.authentication.eu10.hana.ondemand.com/oauth/token
